org.robots.ni

Class PositionsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robots.ni.PositionsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Positions

    public class PositionsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Positions
    This class read the operations from the file and set the initial position,bounds and also set the data to which place robot need to move and it also validates the input instructions from the file. If the file does not have enough instructions it will be return invalid instructions message.
    Author:
    Suresh

      java.lang.String getBounds()
      This returns the upper right corner of the Rectangle in string format
      java.lang.String getData()
      This returns the data which includes movement and rotation commands
      java.lang.String getInitialPos()
      This returns the initial position of the rover
      java.lang.String readOperations()
      This method read the instructions from the file and it validates the input of the file.
